name: Chongyun
title: Frozen Ardor
description: Born with an excess of yang (positive) energy, Chongyun has become a highly effective exorcist in Liyue â€” so effective to the point where he hasn't seen a spirit himself, as they immediately flee when he approaches. The excessive yang energy also makes him particularly susceptible to heat and strong emotion, which has led to some rather unexpected results.

skills.name: Demonbane
skills.description: Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description: Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG. After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.description: Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground. When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents.

passives.name: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.name: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passives.name: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo. This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun. This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
